metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24392 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: In voloko twitter-stream 0.1.10, missing TLS hostname validation allows an attacker to perform a man-in-the-middle attack against users of the library (because eventmachine is misused).

criterions.comment: ruby-twitter-stream: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
